page.title: 05TADMARTON HEATH GOLF CLUB
page.content: THE GOLF CLUB STARTED IN 1915 IN BROUGHTON AND THEN WENT TO HOLYWELL FARM IN 1921.THE CLUB OPENED IN 1922 AND THERE ARE 600 MEMBERS AND 110 FEMALE MEMBERS. MEMBERS LIVE AS FAR AS SCOTLAND AND LONDON BUT MOST ARE LOCAL. THE GOLF COURSE HAS 18 HOLES AND 71 BUNKERS AND 1 HOLYWELL.THERE ARE 4 GROUNDSMEN TO LOOK AFTER THE COURSE AND A SHOP RUN BY THE PROFESSIONAL. THERE IS RESERVOIR LAKE WHICH HOLDS 2 MILLION GALLONS IN CASE OF DROUGHT SO THE CLUB CAN IRRIGATE THE COURSE. THIS HAS BEEN MADE SINCE 1976 WHEN THE CLUB'S WATER SUPPLY WAS CUT. THE CLUB HIRES OUT TROLLEYS AND GOLF CLUBS,BUT MOST MEMBERS HAVE THEIR OWN.THERE ARE GOLF CARTS AVAILABLE FOR THE DISABLED. THE FEE TO JOIN IS Â£400 A YEAR. THE COURSE IS ON A HISTORICAL SITE OF A MEDIEVAL MONASTERY AND THE ROMAN CAMP AT TADMARTON HEATH.
